mapper.select: /* board_SQL.selectBoardList */ SELECT B.IDX, B.NAME, B.ORDER, B.POST_CNT, B.PAGE_CNT, B.IS_OPEN, B.IS_DEL, B.NOTE, DATE_FORMAT(B.WRITE_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS WRITE_DT, DATE_FORMAT(B.MODIFY_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS MODIFY_DT FROM BOARD AS B WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY B.ORDER ASC
/* board_SQL.selectBoardListTotalCnt */ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD AS B

/* board_SQL.selectBoard */ SELECT B.IDX, B.NAME, B.ORDER, B.POST_CNT, B.PAGE_CNT, B.IS_OPEN, B.IS_DEL, B.NOTE, DATE_FORMAT(B.WRITE_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS WRITE_DT, DATE_FORMAT(B.MODIFY_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS MODIFY_DT FROM BOARD AS B WHERE B.NAME = #{name} LIMIT 1
mapper.update: /* board_SQL.updateBoard */ UPDATE BOARD SET NAME = #{name}, ORDER = #{order}, PAGE_CNT = #{pageCnt}, IS_OPEN = #{isOpen}, NOTE = #{note, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFY_DT = NOW() WHERE IDX = #{idx}
/* board_SQL.deleteBoard */ UPDATE BOARD SET IS_DEL = 'Y', MODIFY_DT = NOW() WHERE IDX = #{idx}
